title: Variable(None) seems wrong
body_html:
The expression Variable(None) is accepted without exception in PyTorch, but it will give a Variable wrapping a zero-size(??) tensor, which is basically not something you ever want; you want to an undefined tensor.

Perhaps this problem will go away when Tensor and Variable unify.
body_text:

Perhaps this problem will go away when Tensor and Variable unify.
body:
The expression `Variable(None)` is accepted without exception in PyTorch, but it will give a Variable wrapping a zero-size(??) tensor, which is basically not something you ever want; you want to an undefined tensor.

Perhaps this problem will go away when Tensor and Variable unify.
